name: Hibiscus - Navy
description:
An absolute classic!

Retro fit, quick drying, poly short lined with mesh. Two deep side pockets and a rear pocket with velcro lock. And of course the Jess & Bass embroidered bear that charms and protects. Jess & Bass swimwear and Jess & Bass shorts look and feel great at the beach or as general street wear. Jess & Bass - never take them off.
